name: Fractured Lands
detailed_description:
As a survivor of the Fractured Lands your vehicle is your only friend, fuel is your lifeline and your survival depends on what you’re willing to do to be the last one alive. Scavenge buildings, upgrade vehicles and build loadouts as the encroaching storm forces you to face off with the worst in the Lands.

Set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players begin with a car a wrench and the open road. Drive to the outlying territories with the hopes of securing enough to get by or head straight into the super city for immediate loot and bloodshed.

Post Apocalyptic World


The desolate desert setting channels the use-what-you-can to survive aspect and frantic feeling of the post-apocalyptic setting. Encouraging players to “MacGyver” their way through the game with whatever they can find be it duct tape band-aids, alcohol, blow torchers and any scraps they find out on the wasteland.

Dynamic closing Playing Field


The ever-closing storm in Fractured Lands will have the players fighting to the end as the storm pushes them closer and closer together. The storm dynamically shifts and moves with the player so different strategies can be implemented whether you stay within the eye of the storm or equip a gas mask and embrace the impending doom.

Customizable Vehicles


Vehicles in Fractured Lands are the most powerful weapons in the game. Players start with a bare-to-the-bones vehicles that can be upgraded with powerful attachments such as cutting through armored defenses with a spike bumper, rigging up a nitrous boost to rocket through the battlefield or carrying a surplus inventory to help magnify gameplay strategies.

Battle Royale with Vehicle Combat


Fractured Lands breaks the mold and puts a spin on a familiar formula with an arsenal of vehicles. With every combatant starting behind the wheel of a customizable vehicle, the search for weapons, fuel and parts throughout the game make this a player’s greatest weapon.

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVida GeForce GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7950 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
